what i thought people were joking about it being life sucking, i got like 300 hours in a little over 2 months. and i was laughing about it but now i #8217;m like damn i could have done so much
how did quitting change you?

this game has made me tape my blinds to my wall so i don #8217;t get any glare and mess up my game. It completely destroyed my grades in grade 10. I lost a unhealthy amount of weight because it was all i would do. My nicotine addiction got worse because i needed a boost of joy after losing a AK kit. It has drained my wallet on multiple occasions. I lost a relationship with my girlfriend because i was being raided and didn #8217;t have time to call her. Please god if you can abandon this game at all cost.
what on gods green earth we have a real electrician here folks
